synopsis.text:
His name is Kurumada Gou, a young grade-schooler who, along with other children, finds himself at the helm of a unique mission in a future not too distant from our present day. As the world grapples with disasters of unimaginable proportions and a complex web of crime, the government establishes a new lifeline - the mobile emergency police, Hyper Rescue.

Hyper Rescue's secret weapon? Drive Heads - versatile vehicles that morph from sleek cars into powerful humanoid walkers, each equipped with specialized police, fire-fighting, and rescue capabilities. As suitable candidates, Gou and his peers join forces with Hyper Rescue and other adults, racing against time to safeguard humanity's peace and security.

But when the enigmatic Terra, an android controlled by a malevolent AI, launches an assault on the Mobile Rescue Police, the stakes are raised. Terra's formidable energy renders the Drive Heads inoperable, and as he grows in size, engulfing everything around him, the Earth teeters on the brink of disaster.

In this critical moment, Team Drive Head must rise to the challenge once more. Will Gou and his teammates succeed in protecting what truly matters? Join them in their thrilling, high-stakes rescue missions to find out!
